description: Details of elevation and section drawings showing the new windows at scale 1:5 and 1:10 (as appropriate, and including break lines in the drawings if required) including glazing bar details and including the relationship of the windows to the external wall of the building and also any rebates present in the wall surrounding the window openings, detailed drawings including annotations of materials (including any flashings required etc.) for the ground floor brickwork projections to the rear elevation (and including details of the retention/adaption of the existing projection in place), detailed drawings and samples (including photographs of samples) of materials for any changes to the main front entrance staircase rising from the front garden to ground floor entrance door and also samples (including photographs of samples) for any new hard landscaping paving to the front garden and rear terrace and steps, detailed elevation drawing and confirmation of materials for the new entrance door to the front lightwell located underneath the main entrance staircase to ground floor level and detailed elevation drawings including details of the junction with the steps for any new balustrading to the front entrance steps either descending to the front lightwell or rising to the main ground floor entrance door pursuant to condition 4, 8, 10, 11 and 12 of listed building dated 16th May 2025 (RN:24/08781/LBC)
